venue.name: Audubon Society Nature Center of Glastonbury

item.description: The early signs of spring can be found with good detective work. Join our Nature Trail Guide for an interpretive nature walk the 48 acre Earle Park adjancent to our nature center. Fee is $4.00 per participant which includes entry to the discovery room before and after.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet at the commuter parking lot by John Harvards to carpool. We can meet at 10:15 to be in Glastonbury by10:50, so we can buy tickets and be ready to go. Or just meet us there. Indidcate in your response if you want to carpool.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Early Spring Walk
